title: 002: The Truth About Workout Supplements
description: What is in those workout supplements you are taking? Do they really work? Are they backed by science or pseudo science? Did those massive and ripped athletes that promote supplements get that way because they took the supplements? Sal, Adam & Justin expose the truth about this multi-million dollar industry and you may not like what you hear...
